item.title: How is this an orphaned case?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

You need to clean up your code, make it look nicer, so its easier to read, but on topic,

According to what I have in my Dialogue class, all the “send…chat”'s should have this. in front of them, if the problem persists, PM me your T.V info, and I will explain to you how to figure things out for yourself by using this as an example, so we don’t have to go through this

Read full topic

item.title: How is this an orphaned case?
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

tyb, in my dialogue class this is part of the code


sendNpcChat1("Hello mortal.", c.talkingNpc, "Grim Reaper");
c.nextChat = 91;
break;
case 91:
		sendPlayerChat1("Alright mate.");
		c.nextChat = 92;
		break;
		case 92:

item.title: How is this an orphaned case?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“jal knight, post:3, topic:419052”][code]

public void firstClickNpc(int npcType)
{
c.fishitem = -1;
c.clickNpcType = 0;
c.npcClickIndex = 0;
if (c.fishitem != -1) {
if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(c.fishitem)) {
c.sendMessage("You need a " + c.getItems().getItemName(c.fishitem) + " to fish for " + c.getItems().getItemName(c.fishies));
c.fishing = false;
return;
}

case 6390:
if(c.grimPrize == 0) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(90, npcType);
} else if (c.grimPrize == 1) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(99, npcType);
} else if (c.grimPrize >= 2) {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(101, npcType);
}
break;

                if (c.getItems().freeSlots() == 0) {
                    c.sendMessage("Your inventory is full.");
                    c.fishing = false;
                    return;
                }
                if (c.playerFishing < c.fishreqt) {
                    c.sendMessage("You need a fishing level of " + c.fishreqt + " to fish here.");
                    c.fishing = false;
                    return;
                }
                c.fishtimer = c.getFishing().fishtime(c.fishies, c.fishreqt);
            }
	switch(npcType) {
	case 2244:
		c.getPA().showInterface(26099);
			c.getPA().sendFrame200(26101, 9847);//chatid
			c.getPA().sendFrame185(26101);
			if (c.KC > c.DC) {
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("@or1@Kills: @gre@" +c.KC+" ", 26105);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("@or1@Deaths: @red@"+c.DC+"", 26106);
			}

[/code]

Thanks tyb[/quote]:fp: its not in the switch statement… place it under

switch(npcType) {

Read full topic

item.title: How is this an orphaned case?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.source: How is this an orphaned case?

item.title: How is this an orphaned case?
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:


public void firstClickNpc(int npcType) 
{
	c.fishitem = -1;
		c.clickNpcType = 0;
		c.npcClickIndex = 0;
		if (c.fishitem != -1) {
                    if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(c.fishitem)) {
                        c.sendMessage("You need a " + c.getItems().getItemName(c.fishitem) + " to fish for " + c.getItems().getItemName(c.fishies));
                        c.fishing = false;
                        return;
                    }

case 6390:
			if(c.grimPrize == 0) {
			c.getDH().sendDialogues(90, npcType);
			} else if (c.grimPrize == 1) {
			c.getDH().sendDialogues(99, npcType);
			} else if (c.grimPrize >= 2) {
			c.getDH().sendDialogues(101, npcType);
			}
			break;


                    if (c.getItems().freeSlots() == 0) {
                        c.sendMessage("Your inventory is full.");
                        c.fishing = false;
                        return;
                    }
                    if (c.playerFishing < c.fishreqt) {
                        c.sendMessage("You need a fishing level of " + c.fishreqt + " to fish here.");
                        c.fishing = false;
                        return;
                    }
                    c.fishtimer = c.getFishing().fishtime(c.fishies, c.fishreqt);
                }
		switch(npcType) {
		case 2244:
			c.getPA().showInterface(26099);
				c.getPA().sendFrame200(26101, 9847);//chatid
				c.getPA().sendFrame185(26101);
				if (c.KC > c.DC) {
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@or1@Kills: @gre@" +c.KC+" ", 26105);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@or1@Deaths: @red@"+c.DC+"", 26106);
				}

Thanks tyb

Read full topic
